description:
This game not only provides a relaxing experience with a zen garden environment, but also challenges players with a variety of puzzles, whilst experiencing the growth of the OmoTomO creature.  OmoTomO is suited for new and experienced puzzle players, with its steadily rising difficulty.
Sit down, take a deep breath, and give yourself a relaxing while with Omotomo! 

- Carefully crafted graphics, inspired by the traditional Japanese culture - refreshed and redesigned for the Nintendo Switchâ„¢ Edition!
- Unique atmosphere.
- Relaxing, yet intriguing and demanding gameplay.
- 50 cleverly designed levels set in 4 Seasons.
- Co-op game mode.
name: OmoTomO
intro: OmoTomO is an innovative puzzle game with a single-player and co-operation mode, taking place in a zen garden.
